block.p: American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Traded RHP Brett Hinchcliffe and INF Keith Luuloa to the Chicago Cubs for OF Chris Hatcher, RHP Mike Heathcott and INF Brett King. BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Placed RHP Scott Erickson on the 15-day disabled list. Released OF Rich Amaral. Purchased the contract of RHP Ryan Kohlmeier from Rochester of the International League. Activated 3B Ryan Minor from the 15-day disabled list. Transferred RHP Calvin Maduro from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Acquired RHP Bob Wickman, RHP Steve Woodard and RHP Jason Bere from the Milwaukee Brewers for OF Richie Sexson, RHP Paul Rigdon, RHP Kane Davis, and a player to be named.

American League ANAHEIM ANGELS--Traded RHP Brett Hinchcliffe and INF Keith Luuloa to the Chicago Cubs for OF Chris Hatcher, RHP Mike Heathcott and INF Brett King. BALTIMORE ORIOLES--Placed RHP Scott Erickson on the 15-day disabled list. Released OF Rich Amaral. Purchased the contract of RHP Ryan Kohlmeier from Rochester of the International League. Activated 3B Ryan Minor from the 15-day disabled list. Transferred RHP Calvin Maduro from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Acquired RHP Bob Wickman, RHP Steve Woodard and RHP Jason Bere from the Milwaukee Brewers for OF Richie Sexson, RHP Paul Rigdon, RHP Kane Davis, and a player to be named.

National League FLORIDA MARLINS--Placed SS Alex Gonzalez on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF Chris Clapinski from Calgary of the PCL. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Optioned RHP Eric Gagne and LHP Onan Masaoka to Albuquerque of the PCL. Activated RHP Gregg Olson from the 15-day disabled list. Transferred OF Geronimo Berroa from the 15- to the 60-day disabled list. NEW YORK METS--Acquired SS Mike Bordick from the Baltimore Orioles for INF Melvin Mora, INF Mike Kinkade, RHP Lesli Brea and RHP Pat Gorman; Baltimore assigned Kinkade, Brea and Gorman to the minor leagues. Named Mookie Wilson manager of Scottsdale of the Arizona Fall League. Recalled OF Jason Tyner and 1B-OF Jorge Toca from Norfolk of the International League. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Placed RHP Paul Byrd on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled RHP Cliff Politte from Scranton-Wilkes-Barre of the International League.
Florida State League JUPITER HAMMERHEADS--Reinstated 3B Scott Hodges from the suspended list. Sent C Brian Preston to Cape Fear of the South Atlantic League.

South Atlantic League COLUMBUS REDSTIXX--Announced the renewal of their player development contract with the Cleveland Indians through 2002. GREENSBORO BATS--Announced RHP Eric Igualada has been assigned to Greensboro from the GCL Yankees. MACON BRAVES--Announced that RHP Jung Bong has been promoted to Myrtle Beach of the Carolina League.
Atlantic League ATLANTIC CITY SURF--Released LHP Adam Butler. LONG ISLAND DUCKS--Acquired OF Pat Howell from Atlantic City, completing a previous trade. NEWARK BEARS--Signed LHP Pablo Reyes.
Northern League SCHAUMBURG FLYERS--Announced Nick Franzese, bullpen coach, has signed with Duluth-Superior.
Continental Basketball Association LA CROSSE BOBCATS--Re-signed Bill Klucas, coach, for the 2000-01 season.
National Football League MINNESOTA VIKINGS--Signed TE Johnny McWilliams.

National Hockey League ATLANTA THRASHERS--Signed F Shean Donovan. Extended partnership with the Orlando Solar Bears of the IHL through the 2000-01 season. BUFFALO SABRES--Re-signed C Chris Taylor. DALLAS STARS--Signed LW Jamie Wright, C Chris Wells and C Eric Houde to one-year contracts. FLORIDA PANTHERS--Signed C Rob Niedermayer. NEW YORK ISLANDERS--Signed D Dan Trebil, D Aris Brimanis and D Ray Schultz. East Coast Hockey League AUGUSTA LYNX--Named Mark Holik, Russ Swan, Randy Walker, Dwight McMillen, Andy Pokupec and Dave Barrett scouts. JOHNSTOWN CHIEFS--Signed F Ryan Moynihan. Re-signed D Bryan McKinney.
U.S. BOBSLED FEDERATION--Named Janis Skrastins men's national team coach and Greg Sand men's assistant national team coach.

BOWLING GREEN--Named J.D. Campbell director of athletic communications. CENTRAL MICHIGAN--Announced sophomore WR Jammarl O'Neal did not fulfill NCAA requirements and will not be allowed to play football in the fall. GEORGIA--Named Jenn Garrett assistant sports communications director. QUINNIPIAC--Named Shawn Green men's and women's track coach. ST. JOSEPH'S, IND.--Named Elaine Guyer assistant athletic trainer. TOLEDO--Named Sean Briner assistant athletic director for marketing. Promoted Dave Nottke to assistant athletic director for development and major projects.
